Created attachment 30196
patch

(*) are the selected nodes

TG1
	Sampler 1
	Sampler 2
	TransactionCtl (*)
		Sampler 3 (*)
TG2
	Sampler 4
	Sampler 5
	
If you do a cut and paste in TG2, the result will be
TG1
	Sampler 1
	Sampler 2
TG2
	Sampler 4
	Sampler 5
	TransactionCtl
		Sampler 3
	Sampler 3

The sampler 3 is duplicated.

Benoit WIART
UBIK Ingenierie

Thanks applied with a change to also handle Copy.
